kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=AppAccess, url=http://localhost:5001, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Delete Request
kw.doc: Send a DELETE request on the session object found using the given `alias`
kw.msg: DELETE Request using : uri=/db, params=None, allow_redirects=True, timeout=None headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.21.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} data=None json=None

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Fail
kw.doc: Fails the test with the given message and optionally alters its tags.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
